item.title: About Assassin's Creed
item.description: Assassin's Creed is the first game in the series. It follows the young Assassin, Altaïr on his assassin missions.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed II
item.description: Follow a new character, Ezio in this sequel, as he fights against injustice brought upon his family.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
item.description: Continue your story with Ezio, see the rise of the Assassin Brotherhood in Rome.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed Revelations
item.description: Every journey must come to an end. So must his. Finish your Assassin story with Ezio, now in Istanbul, revealing its dark secrets and see the return of Altaïr.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed III
item.description: Step into the heart of the American revolution and help the patriots in their fight for freedom.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed IV Black Flag
item.description: Fight as the infamous pirate, Edward Kenway, now an assassin in his quests during the golden age of pirates.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed Rogue
item.description: Witness the transformation in Shay, once an assassin, now a templar.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić

item.title: About Assassin's Creed Unity
item.description: Meet the brand new character, Arno, who will fight during the French revolution.
item.author: Bogdan Matorkić
